scripts.main+log: npm run wincmd & python pdnormalize.py && node main.js >> ./text/nlog.txt
scripts.O2+log: npm run wincmd & gcc -O2 cdevice.c -lm && a.exe >> ./text/clog.txt
scripts.pyn+log: npm run wincmd & python pdnormalize.py && python pyndevice.py >> ./text/plog.txt
scripts.formain+log: npm run wincmd & python pdnormalize.py && python slicebatch.py && node formain.js > ./text/nbatch.log & "C:\Program Files (x86)\Hidemaru\Hidemaru.exe" /je ./text/nbatch.log
scripts.forpy+log: npm run wincmd & python pdnormalize.py && python slicebatch.py && python forpyndevice.py > ./text/pbatch.log
scripts.wincmd: if not exist text mkdir text
